response.original_title: 2 or 3 things I Like About Him
response.overview: 2 or 3 things I like about him is an attempt to create a subjective gaze at a professional porn set. Contrasting the proximal POVs of performers Jamal Phoenix and Billy Vega with an at times tableau-vivant-like outside perspective, it oscillates between intimacy and distance.
response.title: 2 or 3 things I Like About Him
